Name: Zoning, 2118 Avenue U, Brooklyn (N 230352 ZRK)
Title: Application number N 230352 ZRK (2118 Avenue U) submitted by 2118 Avenue U, LLC, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, modifying APPENDIX F for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 15, Council District 48.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
